channel.title: Football Data Site
channel.description: I basically just graph some of the data freely available for football leagues, I might even make the occasional comment.

item.title: Introduction
item.dc:creator: allanderek
item.description: The intention of this blog is to mostly use the freely available data on football matches to make some graphs which are hopefully interesting. Initially I will concentrate on the English Premiership,Championship, Leagues One and Two and the Scottish Premiership.
